title: manamirangAdadu
sahitya:
manamirangAdadu EnO marakatambA malai vaLar aru mukhilE


anupallavi

  dinakara jyOti mukha darishanam tEDi anavaratamum unadaDi malar ninaindum nI


caraNam 1    mElai chidambarEshan bhAgam tigazhum tAyE vimmiyazhuvadallAl vEronrum ariyEnE 
kAlai kuLattarugil kuzhandai kadariDavE kaNDu manam porAdu karuNai shuranda nI
    caraNam 2    ulaguyirk-kellAm oru tanit-tAyE nI oruvanukkoru nIti uLLattil koLvAyO 
pala shiru vinai sheida pAvi nAnAyinum parindaruL puriyavE paccai nAyakiyE
